author: jdolen
body:
New PUID 80X training has been added to cms-data:
https://github.com/cms-data/RecoJets-JetProducers/pull/8
This PR updates the CMSSW configs.

A summary of the 80X training results can be found here:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/x3wvesbyavtiqg3/PUIDpres1.pdf?dl=0

Further validation is in progress.
title: Update PUID to 80X training
